mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transactions (id, user_seq, name, amount, method, status, currency, bank_name, card_type, receipt_url, resident_number, account_number) VALUES (#{id}, #{userSeq}, #{name}, #{amount}, #{method}, #{status}, #{currency}, #{bankName}, #{cardType}, #{receiptUrl}, #{residentNumber}, #{accountNumber})
mapper.update: UPDATE transactions SET status = #{status} WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT seq, id, user_seq as userSeq, name, amount, method, status, currency, card_type as cardType, receipt_url as receiptUrl, resident_number as residentNumber, account_number as accountNumber, transaction_date as transactionDate FROM transactions LIMIT #{page}, 10
